summary: AN ORDINANCE, relating to a vehicular and pedestrian skybridge over and across the alley between 11th Avenue Northeast and 12th Avenue Northeast, north of Northeast 43rd Street, amending Ordinance 119161, as amended by Ordinance 121855, to transfer the permit from the General Insurance Company of America to the Board of Regents of the University of Washington, update the insurance and bond requirements, and amend the annual fee; renewing the term of the permit; providing for acceptance of the permit and conditions; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
